Structs/CGVector3.html.name: CGVector3
Structs/CGVector3.html.abstract: This whole file exists basically because SIMD doesn’t support CGFloat and without this file, you’d be doing things like transform.position.x = Double(value) :(

Protocols/Interpolatable.html#/s:10Decom.name: FractionType
Protocols/Interpolatable.html#/s:10Decom.abstract: The type of the fraction that will be used to linearly interpolate Self.

Protocols/Interpolatable.html#/s:10Decom.name: lerp(to:fraction:)
Protocols/Interpolatable.html#/s:10Decom.abstract: Linearly interpolates Self to another instance of Self based on a given fraction.

Protocols/Interpolatable.html.name: Interpolatable
Protocols/Interpolatable.html.abstract: A type that can be linearly interpolated.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4/DecomposedTra.name: rotation
Extensions/matrix_float4x4/DecomposedTra.abstract: The rotation of a transformation matrix (expressed as a quaternion).

Extensions/matrix_float4x4/DecomposedTra.name: eulerAngles
Extensions/matrix_float4x4/DecomposedTra.abstract: The rotation of a transformation matrix (expressed as euler angles).

Extensions/matrix_float4x4/DecomposedTra.name: recomposed()
Extensions/matrix_float4x4/DecomposedTra.abstract: Merges all the properties of the the decomposed transform into a matrix_float4x4 transform.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: identity
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Returns the identity matrix of a matrix_double4x4.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: zero
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Returns a matrix_double4x4 with all zeros.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: init(_:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Initializes a matrix_double4x4 with a CATransform3D.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: decomposed()
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Decomposes this matrix into its specific transform attributes (scale, translation, etc.) and returns a Decomposed struct to alter / recompose it.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: translation
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: The translation of the transformation matrix.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: translated(by:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Returns a copy by translating the current transformation matrix by the given translation amount.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: translate(by:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Translates the current transformation matrix by the given translation amount.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: scale
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: The scale of the transformation matrix.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: scaled(by:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Returns a copy by scaling the current transformation matrix by the given scale.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: scale(by:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Scales the current transformation matrix by the given scale.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: rotation
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: The rotation of the transformation matrix (expressed as a quaternion).

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: rotated(by:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Returns a copy by applying a rotation transform (expressed as a quaternion) to the current transformation matrix.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: rotate(by:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Rotates the current rotation by applying a rotation transform (expressed as a quaternion) to the current transformation matrix.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: eulerAngles
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: The rotation of the transformation matrix (expressed as euler angles, expressed in radians).

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: rotated(by:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Returns a copy by applying a rotation transform (expressed as euler angles, expressed in radians) to the current transformation matrix.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: rotate(by:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Rotates the current rotation by applying a rotation transform (expressed as euler angles, expressed in radians) to the current transformation matrix.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: skew
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: The skew of the transformation matrix.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: skewed(by:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Returns a copy by skewing the current transformation matrix by a given skew.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: skew(by:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Skews the current transformation matrix by the given skew.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: perspective
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: The perspective of the transformation matrix.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: applyingPerspective(_:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Returns a copy by changing the perspective of the current transformation matrix.

Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.name: applyPerspective(_:)
Extensions/matrix_float4x4.html#/s:So13s.abstract: Sets the perspective of the current transformation matrix.

Extensions/CATransform3D/DecomposedTrans.name: DecomposedTransform
Extensions/CATransform3D/DecomposedTrans.abstract: Represents a decomposed CATransform3D in which the transform is broken down into its transform attributes (scale, translation, etc.).

Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.name: translation
Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.abstract: The translation of the layer’s transform (X and Y) as a CGPoint.

Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.name: translationXYZ
Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.abstract: The translation of the layer’s transform (X, Y, and Z) as a vector.

Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.name: scale
Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.abstract: The scale of the layer’s transform (X and Y) as a CGPoint.

Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.name: scaleXYZ
Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.abstract: The scale of the layer’s transform (X, Y, and Z) as a vector.

Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.name: rotation
Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.abstract: The rotation of the layer’s transform (expressed as a quaternion).

Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.name: eulerAngles
Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.abstract: The euler angles of the layer’s transform (expressed in radians).

Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.name: skew
Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.abstract: The shearing of the layer’s transform as a vector.

Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.name: perspective
Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.abstract: The perspective of the layer’s transform as a vector (e.g. .m34).

Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.name: DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy
Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3DProxy.h.abstract: This class exposes properties to manipulate the transform of a CALayer directly with implicit actions (animations) disabled.

Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3D.html.name: DEDecomposedCATransform3D
Classes/DEDecomposedCATransform3D.html.abstract: This class wraps the Swift interface for CATransform3D.DecomposedTransform in a means that it can be used from Objective-C.

Classes/DEDecomposedMatrixFloat4x4.html.name: DEDecomposedMatrixFloat4x4

Categories/CALayer%28Decomposed%29.html#.name: transformProxy
Categories/CALayer%28Decomposed%29.html#.abstract: A proxy object for DEDecomposedCATransform3D that when changed, will apply the recomposed transform to the associated layer with implicit actions (animations) disabled.
